详情: Rent the Runway reviews each item from its Pre-Loved collection to ensure it exceeds its quality standards.
Minor defects may be present but do not impact the physical integrity of the garment and are generally unnoticeable while wearing it.
A metallic knit gives this A.L.C. skirt a can’t-look-away appeal. Pleat detailing and a classic A-line cut adds an effortlessly classic touch to this boldly dazzling piece.
